alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton; Coosa; Elmore (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 2:53AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Autauga, northwestern Elmore, eastern Chilton and Coosa Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 253 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Marble Valley to 6 miles northeast of Vida Junction. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Millbrook, Wetumpka, Rockford, Kellyton, Equality, Weogufka, Deatsville, Eclectic, Dollar, Bradford, Santuck, Titus, Bentleyville, Ten Cedar Estates, Hatchet, Dexter, Verbena, Marbury, Mitchell Lake and Jordan Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
